pros:
Workload is manageable. No need to OT.  Staff recreation activities are well taken care of.
Colleagues are kind, though some of them are in the past their mindset.
cons: Officer handling HR is not well informed and knowledgeable on the HR regulations. Double standard for Leave benefits between contract and permanent staff. Contract follows MOM, permanent follows Handbook. Micromanagement is visible. Not appreciative of staff giving their extra miles.  Rendering help to other department is  uncommon.
